it.polimi.se2018.network.server

Class SimpleRoomDispatcherImplementation

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.network.server.SimpleRoomDispatcherImplementation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RoomDispatcherInterface, java.lang.Runnable

    public class SimpleRoomDispatcherImplementation
extends java.lang.Object
implements RoomDispatcherInterface
    Implementation of RoomDispatcherInterface. This works as per requirements: wait for 2 clients to connect then starts a countdown. If during the countdown 4 players connects it starts a Room immediately, otherwise it waits for the countdown to end. If at the end of the countdown the number of connected players is greater or equal to two, than it starts a Room, otherwise it keeps waiting for one or two clients (depending on how many connected clients are left) to start the Room.

                                          int refreshRate,
                                          int turnCountdownLength)
        Constructs a new implementation of RoomDispatcherInterface
        Parameters:
        roomCountdownLength - number of seconds to wait before starting the room
        refreshRate - rate at which to control if a new client has connected
        turnCountdownLength - length of the turn countdown in length for every room
